TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {11767=Featuring free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool, Hotel Nord 1901 Superior offers accommodations in Girona., 11257=There are lots of activities in the area, such as golfing and hiking.
